text: The 2015 season was Incheon United's eleventh season in the K-League in South Korea. Incheon United competed in the K League Classic and the Korean FA Cup. == Current squad == ===Out on loan=== == Transfers == ===In=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90%;" |- ! # !
